description.full: Enjoy non-stop dance party action with Dance Dance Revolution on Xbox 360 console.Battle against friends to claim the arrows in a DANCE OFF.The arrows will go to the dancer with the fastest feet and sharpest timing.Dance to continuous tracks in CLUB MODE.The difficulty level can suddenly switch depending on the player's dance style.The excitement is non-stop, with all sorts of TRICKS waiting to wrong-foot you.With Dance Dance Revolution, you can share the excitement with your friends and family!
description.short: Enjoy non-stop dance party action with Dance Dance Revolution on Xbox 360 console.Battle against friends to claim the arrows in a DANCE OFF.The arrows will go to the dancer with the fastest feet and sharpest timing.Dance to continuous tracks in CLUB MODE.The difficulty level can suddenly switch depending on the player's dance style.The excitement is non-stop, with all sorts of TRICKS waiting to wrong-foot you.With Dance Dance Revolution, you can share the excitement with your friends and family!
